Title: Dragonheart 3: The Sorcerer's Curse
Writer: Matthew Feitshans, Patrick Read Johnson (based on characters created by), Charles Edward Pogue (based on characters created by)
Actors: Julian Morris, Tamzin Merchant, Jassa Ahluwalia, Dominic Mafham
Plot: When aspiring knight Gareth goes in search of a fallen comet rumored to contain gold, he is shocked to instead find a set of dragon eggs guarded by dragon Drago. After Drago saves Gareth's life the two become intricately bonded, and must work together to defeat an evil sorcerer and stop his reign of terror. Along the way, Gareth learns the true meaning of being a knight in this fantasy action-adventure for the ages.
